Address.value: 5075 SOUTH SYRACUSE STREET, DENVER, Colorado, 80237, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: RE/MAX Holdings Inc operates as a franchisor of real estate brokerage services. It recruits and retains agents and sells franchises. The company operates a business in four reportable segments which are Real Estate, Mortgage, Marketing Funds and Other.
